org.monome.pages
Class MachineDrum

java.lang.Object
  org.monome.pages.MachineDrum

public class MachineDrum
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to interact with the Elektron MachineDrum over a MIDI connection.

Author:
Tom Dinchak

Method Detail

sendRandomParamChange

public void sendRandomParamChange(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                                  int machine_number,
                                  int param_number)
Sends a random MIDI CC value from 0-127 to machine_number's param_number through the output_device.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output to use
machine_number - The machine number (0=BD, 1=SD, etc.)
param_number - The parameter number (0-7 = first page from upper left to bottom right, 8-15 = second page, 16-23 = third page)

sendKitLoad

public void sendKitLoad(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                        int kit_number)
Sends a request to load the kit specified by kit_number.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output to use
kit_number - The kit number to load (0 = first kit, 63 = last kit)

sendKitSave

public void sendKitSave(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                        int kit_number)
Sends a request to save the current kit to kit slot specified by kit_number.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output to use
kit_number - The kit number to save the current kit into

sendAssignMachine

public void sendAssignMachine(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                              int track,
                              byte machine)
Sends a request to initialize and assign a machine to a track.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output to use
track - The track number (0=BD, 1=SD, etc.)
machine - The machine number to assign, see the MachineDrum manual's appendix

sendFxParam

public void sendFxParam(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                        java.lang.String fx,
                        int param,
                        int value)
Sends a request to set the value of a global fx unit parameter.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output to use
fx - The name of the global fx unit: "echo", "gate", ,"eq", or "compressor"
param - The parameter number (0 = first paramater)
value - The new value (from 0-127)

initKit

public void initKit(javax.sound.midi.Receiver output_device,
                    int x)
Sends a request to initialize a new drum kit. This means initializing all tracks with machines randomly selected from a pool.

Parameters:
output_device - The MIDI output device
x - Which pools to use when assigning machines, currently only pool 0 will work

getMachine

public byte getMachine(java.lang.String name)
Translates machine names to the number they're referenced by in Sysex messages.

Parameters:
name - The name of the machine ("GND-SIN", "TRX-BD", etc.)
Returns:
The value that refers to that machine in Sysex messages
